topic.title: backup zeroid
topic.body: i would like to have a way to backup my zeroid so i can reuse it insted of having to make a new one diferent from the one i used before each time i reinstall it if i lose my data, i can re download all the sites i had lost but my id i can never use again if i lose. please can you guys provice this or at least tell me what files i need to backup in order to preserve my zeroid

1604067628_mirrored_HarpyX_github.body:
> @HarpyX Did that answer your question?

yes thank you
